body:
with Epstein

Attachments: TEXT. htm, Charisma Edge.vef
FYL.From| "regarding her last interaction w Epstein prior to her departure on Thursday.
Charisma Edge
Associate Warden
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, NY 10007
646-836-6300 ext PP" |
NYM/AW-Programs~ @bop.gov
>>fPrPr ——___@aol.com> 8/10/2019 8:28 PM >>>
| visited inmate Epstein in SHU on Thursday. He was getting ready to meet with his attorneys for the day so |
had gone to visit him right after the SHU meeting. He had a cell mate at the time with whom | saw him
interact with. He did not report any mental health concerns and he denied any suicidal thoughts or intention.
He was asking this writer to go to general population and was making requests for various needs he had at
the time. He wanted social calls without them being on a speaker phone. He wanted a book he had left in
the suicide watch area. His mood was not depressed or anxious. There were no signs of distress. He had
planned on meeting with his attorneys to work on his legal situation.
Sent from my iPhone

Page 2062
